Detailed Description

Multiple rights object can reference the same asset. Therefore DrmRightsObjectContainer is exposing the same interface than DrmRightsObject, but will ensure that all rights object will be consulted / updated accordingly.

INT DrmRightsObjectContainer::GetCount (   )  const
 

Returns the number of rights objects available for the asset.

Multiple rights object can reference the same asset. Therefore DrmRightsObjectContainer is exposing the same interface than DrmRightsObject, but will ensure that all rights object will be consulted / updated accordingly.

BOOLEAN DrmRightsObjectContainer::IsAllowed (  DrmOperation  op  ) 
 

IsAllowed returns TRUE if specified operation is allowed on asset. All rights object in the container will be consulted.

BOOLEAN DrmRightsObjectContainer::IsDrmOpValid (  DrmOperation  op,
MimeType  mo_type
)  const
 

The function checks whether the given permissions can be allowed on the media object based on its MIME type.

Parameters:

Returns:

BOOLEAN DrmRightsObjectContainer::OnContentConsumedStart (  DrmOperation  op  )
